Author: AtmoOmen
Name: Currency Tracker
Description:
Track changes of Currencies and Record them as Transactions!

Also allow you to query, export, add custom currencies tracker and view visualized data.
Changelog:
- Fixed a bug where incorrect character data was loaded after switching characters.
- Completely rewrote the code logic for handling multiple characters.
- Added a help page.
- Completely rewrote Trackers. Now, different functions will exist as modules, allowing you to freely combine them in the Record Settings [DEV].
- Added a feature to record the Content/Duty name as a note.
- Added a feature to record the Teleport Costs.
- Added a feature to wait for the completion of a trade/exchange before checking for currency changes.
- Added preliminary functions for recording Gold Saucer-related information (Triple Triad, Mini Cactpot).
- All text search functions within the plugin are now: (English) case-insensitive, (Simplified Chinese) with support for Pinyin input.
